page.title: 18Trip To SB House.
page.content: We S Charlton,W Curry,R Gray left school at 11.40am in the school mini- bus.Three pupils from media studies came with us to take still frame pictures,past and present.We drove down the road until we stopped outside the gates which is only 400 m down the road from the School.We drove through and up the drive.There were large trees lining the drive and on the right hand side there was a large grassed field.We got to a fork in the drive.One of roads lead to the garages, the other lead to the house. The guard dogs began to bark.There was a Labrador and a Jack Russel but they did not bark as much as the German Shep herd which was tied up. We introduced ourselves to Mr Liffney and Mr Snowball.From an early census we found that Mr SnowballÂ£s grandfather
